function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent SARS-CoV-2 testing among counties leading to underestimation of infection cases","Impact":"Unreliable confirmed cases of infection in the early periods","Mitigation":"Implement consistent and widespread testing across all counties","Technologies":"Rapid testing technologies, mobile testing units","People":"Residents of counties with inconsistent testing","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Substantial underestimation of infection cases in some areas during the early stage of the pandemic","Impact":"Unreliable data on infection rates and spread","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and reporting systems, implement widespread testing","Technologies":"Data analytics, reporting systems, testing technologies","People":"Residents of areas with underreported cases","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Reduced infection risk associated with forest within walking distance","Impact":"Potential reduction in SARS-CoV-2 infection rates and other health benefits","Mitigation":"Prioritize access to forest located within walking distance of population centers","Technologies":"GIS mapping, urban planning tools","People":"Residents living near forests","Owner":"Local government, urban planners"}]}
